channel.title: [pi]flames on client background?[pi]
channel.description: hi everyone, i have a PI client and i need those pesky flames on it going away, ive searched for method51 and method58 in client.java but i cant find them (yes i am using the Ctrl + F hotkey to search) so if anyone can help me with removing them it would be great
